1.title: Borrowed Agony
1.plot: Stories from people who have come in contact with cursed objects. Victor's sister receives a doll as a gift from a witch when they were children. Strange things start to happen in the house, which carry on into Victor's adult life. The "Crying Boy" painting is a famous work of art that is said to cause the home it is in to burn to the ground; everything is destroyed except the painting. Richard innocently puts on a welding mask while at a friend's house and unknowingly opens a door for the spirit of its dead owner to haunt and terrorize him.

2.title: Inherited Misery
2.plot: Three stories about cursed bloodlines and families are told in this episode. John is a direct descendant of the Bell Witch who terrorizes the men in his bloodline until they commit suicide or are driven insane. Brandon is a young man who learns how his family curse is killing off the men by way of cars, which scares him to death. An angry relative curses Tiffany and her family causing noises, strange occurrences and violent actions to take place within their home.

3.title: Tempting Fate
3.plot: Three stories of curses associated with removing objects from forbidden places are told in this episode. Jake is seduced by a legendary witch and cursed to feel pain and misery because he has taken ancient relics from her land. Bodie State Park in California is visited by countless tourists each year who innocently take knickknacks home with them only to find themselves stricken with illness, accidents and sudden death. Brother Carlos, a Christian exorcist, tells the story of a doctor who bought a cursed object while traveling to Egypt and sought out an exorcism to ...

4.title: Curse of the Gods
4.plot: Stories about cultural curses and those affected in terrible ways. Tiffany fires a Native American employee and quickly finds herself tormented by his devastating curse. Lawrence crosses the wrong woman who has a Voodoo curse placed on him, which he cannot remove. The "Curse of the Skinwalker" is a well-known Navajo legend and belief that a person can transform into a dangerous and deadly creature.

5.title: Unwelcome Guests
5.plot: Stories about cursed locations and the people affected by them. Alfonso and his family moved into a home that quickly made their lives a living hell through aggressive attacks and a physical possession. A witch who saw her people burned at the stake cursed the Manchac Swamp in Louisiana. She doomed the land and all that enter it. William is a paranormal investigator called to help a manager at a theatre but quickly finds himself face to face with a nasty spirit.

imdb.plot outline: First-person accounts of how curses have tormented, hurt and even killed those affected are told by the people who have lived through them and by those who have seen others affected. Cinematic re-enactments and compelling interviews paint a picture of what it's like to live with, and die by, a curse.
imdb.title: Cursed
plot: First-person accounts of how curses have tormented, hurt and even killed those affected are told by the people who have lived through them and by those who have seen others affected. Cinematic re-enactments and compelling interviews paint a picture of what it's like to live with, and die by, a curse.::Anonymous
